sentences.en: Both plays were published under the pseudonym of Philip Dayre.
sentences.cn: 两个剧本都是以菲利普·戴尔的笔名出版的。

sentences.en: Brief introduction of author: AnKang, the pseudonym: Wang Yong , cloud and valley of the word.
sentences.cn: 作者简介: 王安康, 笔名: 王永,字云谷.

sentences.en: Darren Shan is the pseudonym for Darren Shaughnessy.
sentences.cn: 向达伦是达伦.欧沙纳西的笔名.

sentences.en: Did he publish his novels under his own name or under his pseudonym?
sentences.cn: 他是用真名还是笔名发表小说 啊 ?

sentences.en: Eric Blair wrote under the pseudonym of George Orwell.
sentences.cn: 埃里克·布莱尔用乔治·奧威尔这个笔名写作.

sentences.en: George Eliot was the pseudonym of Mary Ann Evans.
sentences.cn: 乔治.艾略特是玛丽.安. 埃文斯的笔名.

sentences.en: If a pseudonym is used, please also provide the real name.
sentences.cn: 著者如用笔名, 请同时填上真名.

sentences.en: O . Henry is the pseudonym of William Sydney Porter.
sentences.cn: “ 欧亨利 ”是“威廉·希德内波特”的笔名.
塞缪尔克莱门斯'假名是马克吐温.

sentences.en: There we had the good fortune to meet Jake Simpson [ an pseudonym ].
sentences.cn: 我们在那里又有幸遇到杰克.辛普森 ( 化名 ).

sentences.en: Today, we continue to use Saint Nicholas ( or Saint Nick ) as a pseudonym for Santa Claus.
sentences.cn: 今天, 我们仍然使用圣·尼克拉斯 ( 或者圣·尼克 ) 作为圣诞老人的别称.

sentences.en: Ulcer is his seventh book, all written under pseudonym Fang Zhouzi.
sentences.cn: 《溃疡》是他的第七本书, 这些书都以“方舟子”的笔名发表.

words.tran_cn: 匿名的；使用笔名的；使用假名的

trans.tran_en: an invented name that a writer, artist etc uses instead of their real name
